JobGroups.template:
defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-4.0-install-iso-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: install-iso
    version: '4.0'
  qubesos-4.1-install-iso-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: install-iso
    version: '4.1'
  qubesos-4.2-install-iso-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: install-iso
    version: '4.2'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-4.0-install-iso-x86_64:
    - install_minimal:
        machine: mac
        priority: 40
    - install_minimal:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_default:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_default:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_iso_file:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_over_existing:
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_usbvm_combined:
        priority: 10
    - install_no_usbvm:
        priority: 10
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_locale:
        priority: 20
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 51
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_nvme:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_default:
        machine: hw5
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: hw5
    qubesos-4.1-install-iso-x86_64:
    - install_minimal:
        machine: mac
        priority: 40
    - install_minimal:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal_kernel_latest:
        machine: uefi
        testsuite: install_minimal
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_usb:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_usb:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_default:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_default:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_iso_file:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_over_existing:
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_usbvm_combined:
        priority: 10
    - install_no_usbvm:
        priority: 10
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_locale:
        priority: 20
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_unencrypted_upload_kernel_latest:
        testsuite: install_unencrypted_upload
        machine: 64bit
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_nvme:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:
        machine: 64bit
        testsuite: install_nvme
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:
        machine: uefi
        testsuite: install_nvme
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_default:
        machine: hw1
    - install_default_kernel_latest:
        machine: hw7
        testsuite: install_default
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: hw1
    - install_default:
        machine: hw6
        priority: 10
    qubesos-4.2-install-iso-x86_64:
    - install_minimal:
        machine: mac
        priority: 40
    - install_minimal:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal_kernel_latest:
        machine: uefi
        testsuite: install_minimal
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_usb:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_usb:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_default:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_default:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_iso_file:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_over_existing:
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_usbvm_combined:
        priority: 10
    - install_no_usbvm:
        priority: 10
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_locale:
        priority: 20
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_unencrypted_upload_kernel_latest:
        machine: 64bit
        testsuite: install_unencrypted_upload
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_nvme:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:
        machine: 64bit
        testsuite: install_nvme
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:
        machine: uefi
        testsuite: install_nvme
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_default:
        machine: hw1
    - install_default:
        machine: hw6
    - install_default_kernel_latest:
        machine: hw7
        testsuite: install_default
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: hw1

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-*-pull-requests-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: pull-requests
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-pull-requests-x86_64:
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui
    - system_tests_network
    - system_tests_backup
    - system_tests_pvgrub_salt_storage
    - system_tests_extra
    - system_tests_backupcompatibility
    - system_tests_update:
        priority: 10
    - system_tests_whonix:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_gui_tools:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_manager
    - system_tests_suspend:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_splitgpg
    - system_tests_dispvm
    - system_tests_devices
    - system_tests_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_guivm_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_xfs
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_btrfs
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_ext4
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_zfs
    - system_tests_vm_qrexec_gui_pipewire
    - system_tests_usbproxy
    - system_tests_qrexec
    - system_tests_network_ipv6
    - system_tests_network_updates
    - system_tests_backupdispvm
    - install_default_upload:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 5
        settings:
          ISO: Qubes-%VERSION%-stable.iso
          HDD_1: ""
    - system_tests_update:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 10
        settings:
          START_DIRECTLY_AFTER_TEST: install_default_upload
          HDD_1: disk_default_%VERSION%_%MACHINE%.qcow2
          WORKER_CLASS: hw1
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui:
        machine: hw1
    - system_tests_gui_interactive:
        machine: hw1
#    - system_tests_guivm_gui_interactive:
#        machine: hw1
    - system_tests_whonix:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_qwt_win10:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_qwt_win7:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_gui_tools:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_suspend:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 40

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:

    - install_btrfs:
        machine: uefi

    - install_over_existing:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_usbvm_combined:
        priority: 10
    - install_no_usbvm:

    - install_keyboard_layout:

    - install_locale:
        priority: 20
    - install_legacy_ext4:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_legacy_ext4:
        machine: uefi
    - install_nvme:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit

    - install_xfs:

    - release_upgrade_modified_repo:

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-*-templates-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: templates
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-templates-x86_64:
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui
    - system_tests_network
    - system_tests_network_ipv6
    - system_tests_network_updates
    - system_tests_backup
    - system_tests_pvgrub_salt_storage
    # this tests only default template, so setting DEFAULT_TEMPLATE is expected
    - system_tests_gui_interactive
    - system_tests_extra
    - system_tests_update:
        priority: 10
    - system_tests_whonix
    - system_tests_splitgpg

TestSuites.description: basic tests on XFS filesystem (reflink pool)
TestSuites.name: system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_xfs

TestSuites.description: basic tests on BTRFS filesystem (reflink pool)
TestSuites.name: system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_btrfs

TestSuites.description: basic tests on ext4 filesystem (file pool)
TestSuites.name: system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_ext4

TestSuites.description: Default installation, preserve disk for further tests
TestSuites.name: install_default_upload

TestSuites.description: basic tests on ZFS filesystem (zfs pool)
TestSuites.name: system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_zfs
